title: Bu Yiyang De Tuzi Huihua Pian
synopsis: The "Different Rabbit" series of cartoons is the first domestic animated series that meets the "06 Green Animation Standards", and is also the first domestic teaching cartoon designed with interactive principles. In the production of each series, relevant education experts will formulate a scientific and complete syllabus. The teaching goals include both detailed academic goals and detailed emotional intelligence training goals, such as each episode containing at least one theme "Good Habits, Good Behaviors" education covers the five main abilities of emotional intelligence: the ability to understand one's own emotions, the ability to control one's emotions, the ability to motivate oneself, the ability to understand the emotions of others, and the ability to maintain harmonious interpersonal relationships Wait (translated from tenceng)

Character.name: Bu Yiyang De Tuzi Yinyue Pian
